name: Oatmeal Raisin “Cookie” Protein Smoothie
description: What happens when you strip an oatmeal cookie of all that added sugar and unnecessary butter? You get something that’s actually pretty nutritious. We took those wholesome ingredients, including heart-healthy oats and fiber-rich raisins, and blended them up with our vegan protein Fuel-6 for a smoothie that even Cookie Monster would devour. Plus, it packs 27 grams of protein!
header: Prep time: 0 minutes - Cook time: 5 minutes - Serves 1 - Protein: Fuel-6
ingridients: 1 cup unsweetened almond milk2 scoops DailyBurn Fuel-6, vanilla 1 half banana, frozen2 tablespoons quick cooking rolled oats (gluten-free optional)1 tablespoon raisins0.25 teaspoon ground cinnamon1 pinch nutmeg1 pinch sea salt
nutrition_facts: per 14 ounces serving300 cal6 g fat (1.5 g sat)34 g carbs717 mg sodium27 g protein
